title: Large plot of land with easy access to main road
details:
The perfect plot of land for your residence in a highly residential and commercial surrounding, conveniently located in the heart of the city.

This area contains a 34 perches land with an old house which can be renovated or reconstructed according to your motive.

Easy access to both Havelock road and Duplication road. Schools, banks, hospitals, restaurants and other basic amenities within close range.

For further inquiries contact Linea Property.


REF ID : - LPLS070
